emails.title: Emails to verify
emails.description: Enter email addresses to verify, one per line.

backendUrl.title: Backend URL (Optional)
backendUrl.description: Base URL of the check-if-email-exists HTTP backend. Leave empty to use the bundled backend (http://localhost:8080).

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of emails to verify in parallel. Higher values = faster processing but more resource usage.

retryCount.title: Retry count
retryCount.description: Number of retry attempts for failed email verifications.

timeout.title: Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for each email verification request.

proxy.title: SOCKS5 Proxy (Optional)
proxy.description: Optional SOCKS5 proxy configuration for SMTP connections. Useful for bypassing rate limits or accessing restricted networks.

host.title: Host
host.description: Proxy server hostname or IP address
